Text: This is the only pokemon black file that I have found so far that doesn't keep you from gaining exp. It works for me on 'desmume' but I'm not sure about any other emulators yet. I haven't had and glitches or freezes yet but I will comment again once I've played for a while

one more thing. I wasn't able to use my save state from another pokemon black file with this rom. even though i was using this rom, it acted like i was using the other. Long story short, you'll likely need to start a new game for it to work properly.
I have a dstt so if you are using it search for wood4tt

then open ttmenu with the icon:
ak rpg
